title: Hyundai India announces to invest Rs 32,000 crore in India over next 10 years
description: Hyundai Motor India plans to invest Rs 32,000 crore over the next 10 years, including Rs 6,000 crore in Pune. A new plant will boost production capacity by 30% by 2028. The company is focusing on the SUV segment and electric vehicles. The IPO, open from October 15 to 17, aims to attract local and global investors.
